driving_license_new.title: New Nepali Driving License

criteria.health_standards: Must pass a physical fitness test (eyesight, color blindness, and physical mobility)

required_documents: Medical Fitness Certificate from a certified doctor
Proof of address (if different from citizenship)
process: Step 1: Fill out the online application via the Department of Transport Management (DoTM) portal.
Step 2: Visit the Transport Management Office (TMO) for document verification and biometrics.
Step 3: Appear for the Written Examination (Likhit).
Step 4: Upon passing Likhit, appear for the Practical Test (Trial) within 90 days. You have 3 attempts per application
Step 5: Pay the license fee after passing the trial and receive a payment receipt (valid for driving until the smart card is printed).

license_lost_destroyed_replacement.title: Duplicate License (Pratilipi)
license_lost_destroyed_replacement.criteria: Applicable if the original license is lost, stolen, or physically damaged beyond recognition
required_documents: Police Report stating the loss of the license
Copy of the lost license (if available) or License Number.
Application form for a duplicate copy
process: Step 1: File a report at the local police station to get a 'Lost Document' verification.
Step 2: Visit the TMO where your license was last issued/renewed.
Step 3: Submit the application, police report, and citizenship copy.
Step 4: Pay the duplicate fee and receive the replacement receipt.

category_addition.desc: Adding a new category (e.g., adding Car to an existing Bike license).
category_addition.process: Apply for 'Category Addition' online. You only need to pass the Practical Test (Trial) for the new category; a new written exam is usually not required.

license_renewal.desc: Licenses must be renewed every 5 year.
license_renewal.requirement: Old driving license, medical certificate, and renewal fee.

international_permit.desc: Foreigners or Nepalis with international licenses can apply for a local permit validation.
international_permit.requirement: Valid international driving permit and original passport/visa.
